name: Barnyard Animals SE
description:
16 fun and interactive farm animals with easy controls so even little ones as young as 6 months old can play! Simply tap the animal to make them dance, move around, and make fun animal sounds. And 6 effect buttons keeps your toddler entertained with colorful fireworks, balloons, fruit, and more to pop and squish!

Designed for ages 6 months to 4 years, this app is great to keep your little ones entertained. Tons of funny sounds, colorful animations, and lots of buttons to push will keep them occupied while you get stuff done!

This is the School Edition (SE) version of the app which includes all features unlocked.

Interactive animals include: Cow, Sheep, Dog, Pig, Deer, Lion, Duck, Fox, Goat, Cat, Chicken, Mouse, Hen, Owl, Bunny, and Horse.
